content:
students will venture to New York New York this weekend to explore the city and network with companies PERIOD

This Saturday nine lesbian gay bisexual transgender and ally students will be travelling to the city for the third national out in Science Technology Engineering and Mathematics Conference PERIOD

oSTEM is a national conference that helps LGBTA students network and find future jobs in the STEM fields Michael Olah the acting president of Penn States branch of oSTEM said PERIOD This year the oSTEM conference will be held at Google Headquarters in New York N.Y. he said PERIOD

Various representatives from industry academia and the government attend to give talks and hold workshops Olah graduatechemistry said PERIOD Some companies that will be attending this year include Alcoa BASF General Electric General Motors and Google as well as government entities like the CIA and Department of Energy. local oSTEM chapters from all over the country send students to this conference Olah said PERIOD Penn State has also sent students to this conference before Olah added PERIOD

The students will leave for New York Friday night then stay for the weekend Zach Reitz one of the students attending the trip said PERIOD

Students will be at the conference all day Saturday participating in various talks and workshops Reitz seniorchemistry said PERIOD

There is going to LGBT friendly companies at the conference that will give different talks about coming out in the work place Reitz said PERIOD

The workshops cover a variety of topics Olah said PERIOD They have workshops on professional development and mentoring talks on emerging technologies and discussions of policies affecting the LGBTA community from K12 through tenured professorships Olah said PERIOD

Students who are going said they are hoping to meet companies so when graduation day comes they will have a safe work place to pursue PERIOD

It is important to show the LGBT community that you can be out in not only the workforce but also out in the STEM fields Alexandra Saltz seniorbiochemistry and molecular biology said PERIOD This community is usually closed and quiet about their relationship status because the STEM fields alone are hard to get into none the less when you make yourself a majority. reitz said LGBTA people who are going into the workforce after school would be able to find a company where they will fit in and be accepted PERIOD

When I graduate I want to go somewhere that is going to support my husband and me and give us the benefits that they give to straight couples Reitz said PERIOD

If youre interested in submitting a Letter to the Editor click here PERIOD

Follow her on Twitter at featherkasey PERIOD

When I graduate I want to go somewhere that is going to support my husband and me and give us the benefits that they give to straight couples. were always interested in hearing about news in our community PERIOD Let us know whats going on
